title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Mixed-Methods Analysis of Mathematics Teaching-Learning Perceptions Using Q Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of mathematics education and proficiency in utilizing digital devices
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of Q methodology and its applicability to educational research.
Learners can collect data on learner perceptions of mathematics pedagogy in blended learning environments using Q-sorting tools.
Learners can derive learner cluster characteristics (factors) by analyzing data collected via tools similar to Q-PerspectivesÂ® Online in real time.
Learners can propose personalized mathematics instructional strategies based on research findings and apply them to project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
